revised_title: Investigating Adjuvants and Skin Grafting Across the H-Y Barrier
tldr: This study investigates the effects of biological adjuvants on skin grafting across the H-Y barrier in mice. The results show that adjuvants can have immunopotentiating or enhancing effects depending on the treatment conditions. The H-Y barrier skin grafting technique appears to be a useful tool for studying adjuvants and their mechanisms of action, which is essential for optimizing their use in cancer treatment.
